name: materiioptionale-uvt
description: UVT Academic Management System - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev --prefix api" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:api && npm run install:frontend
scripts.health: curl -f http://localhost:5001/health && echo '\nAPI: Running' || echo 'API: Not running'
